rule.name: AMS_GetUSerDetails
rule.definition: load( /* This variable would normally be retrieved with a rule like rule!getAllStatuses(). */ local!statuses: { {id: 1, name: "Qualification", icon: "filter"}, {id: 2, name: "Evaluation", icon: "search"}, {id: 3, name: "Decision", icon: "gavel"}, {id: 4, name: "Negotiation", icon: "comments"}, {id: 5, name: "Closed", icon: "check-circle"} }, local!pickedStatuses: remove(local!statuses, {5}), /* This variable would normally be retrieved with a rule like rule!getOpportunitiesForRegion(region: "NAW"). */ local!objects: { { id: 23, name: "Any Town Bank", industry: "Financial Services", location: "Franklin, WA", dollar: round(rand() * 999, 0), winConfidence: roundup(rand() * 100, 0), duration: roundup(rand() * 40, 0), status: 1 }, { id: 47, name: "Globex Corporation", industry: "Real Estate", location: "Boise, ID", dollar: round(rand() * 999, 0), winConfidence: roundup(rand() * 100, 0), duration: roundup(rand() * 40, 0), status: 1 }, { id: 5, name: "Nash Hotels", industry: "Hospitality", location: "Flagstaff, AZ", dollar: round(rand() * 999, 0), winConfidence: roundup(rand() * 100, 0), duration: roundup(rand() * 40, 0), status: 2 }, { id: 52, name: "Zibal Tax Services", industry: "Financial Services", location: "Los Angeles, CA", dollar: round(rand() * 999, 0), winConfidence: roundup(rand() * 100, 0), duration: roundup(rand() * 40, 0), status: 2 }, { id: 135, name: "Lorentz and Fitzgerald", industry: "Legal Services", location: "Provo, UT", dollar: round(rand() * 999, 0), winConfidence: roundup(rand() * 100, 0), duration: roundup(rand() * 40, 0), status: 2 }, { id: 99, name: "Tarkin Construction", industry: "Construction", location: "San Diego, CA", dollar: round(rand() * 999, 0), winConfidence: roundup(rand() * 100, 0), duration: roundup(rand() * 40, 0), status: 3 }, { id: 91, name: "Bossk Tourist Adventures", industry: "Services", location: "Carson City, NV", dollar: round(rand() * 999, 0), winConfidence: roundup(rand() * 100, 0), duration: roundup(rand() * 40, 0), status: 3 }, { id: 144, name: "Antilles Transport", industry: "Transportation", location: "Norfolk, OR", dollar: round(rand() * 999, 0), winConfidence: roundup(rand() * 100, 0), duration: roundup(rand() * 40, 0), status: 4 }, { id: 144, name: "Dune Office Automation", industry: "Consulting", location: "Oxford, WA", dollar: round(rand() * 999, 0), winConfidence: roundup(rand() * 100, 0), duration: roundup(rand() * 40, 0), status: 4 }, { id: 98, name: "Kaus Media", industry: "Services", location: "Liberty, UT", dollar: round(rand() * 999, 0), winConfidence: roundup(rand() * 100, 0), duration: roundup(rand() * 40, 0), status: 5 } }, { #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_columnsLayout"( columns: { #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_columnLayout"( contents: { /* This dropdown would run a save that requeries the list of opportunities for a different region. */ #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_dropdownField"( label: "Region", labelPosition: "COLLAPSED", placeholderLabel: "--- Select a Value ---", choiceLabels: {"North America West", "North America East", "Europe", "Australia and Pacific"}, choiceValues: {1, 2, 3, 4}, value: 1 ), #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_cardLayout"( contents: {}, style: "NONE", height: "AUTO", marginBelow: "STANDARD" ), #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_billboardLayout"( backgroundMedia: #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_documentImage"( document: #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_EXAMPLE_BILLBOARD_IMAGE"() ), backgroundColor: "#f0f0f0", overlayStyle: "DARK", overlayContents: {}, marginBelow: "STANDARD" ) }, width: "MEDIUM" ), #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_columnLayout"( contents: { #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_checkboxField"( label: "Statuses to Display", labelPosition: "COLLAPSED", choiceLabels: local!statuses.name, choiceValues: local!statuses, value: local!pickedStatuses, saveInto: local!pickedStatuses, choicelayout: "COMPACT", align: "RIGHT" ), #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_pieChartField"( label: "Pie Chart", labelPosition: "ABOVE", series: { #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_chartSeries"(label: "Chart Series 1", data: 1), #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_chartSeries"(label: "Chart Series 2", data: 2), #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_chartSeries"(label: "Chart Series 3", data: 3) }, showDataLabels: true ), #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_lineChartField"( label: "Line Chart", labelPosition: "ABOVE", categories: {"Category 1", "Category 2", "Category 3"}, series: { #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_chartSeries"(label: "Chart Series", data: {1, 2, 3}) }, showLegend: true, showTooltips: true ), #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_hierarchyBrowserFieldTree"( label: "Hierarchy Browser (Tree)", labelPosition: "ABOVE", pathValue: {3, 2}, nextLevelValues: enumerate(fv!nodeValue) + 1, nodeConfigs: #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_hierarchyBrowserFieldTreeNode"( id: fv!nodeValue, label: "Node " & fv!nodeValue, description: "Description for " & fv!nodeValue, details: "Details for " & fv!nodeValue, image: #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_documentImage"(document: #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_iconNewsEvent"(icon: "PERSON")), isDrillable: true ) ), #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_orgChartField"( label: "Org Chart", labelPosition: "ABOVE", value: loggedInUser(), saveInto: {} ) } ) }, alignvertical: "MIDDLE" ) } )
